snippet: Who do you think should join Gerard Depardieu and Isabelle Adjani in the cast of a movie about Dominique Strauss-Kahn and his wife during the 2011 sexual assault case?
abstract: Who do you think should join Gerard Depardieu and Isabelle Adjani in the cast of a movie about Dominique Strauss-Kahn and his wife during the 2011 sexual assault case?

headline.main: Casting Call for a Strauss-Kahn Film
